alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 6:43PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Jefferson, northwestern Taylor, eastern Leon and southwestern Madison Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 642 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southwest of Monticello, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Tallahassee, Cody, Hells Half Acre, Lamont, Eridu, Nash, Miccosukee, Cabbage Grove, Thomas City, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Chaires, Waukeenah, Wacissa, Wacissa Springs, Pisgah Church, Lake Miccosukee, Fincher and Apalachee Regional Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Leon; Madison
